title: The Elusive I  8
description:
In this video I present an integration of the relevance realization (RR) account with an existing predictive processing (PP) account of the self and finish my core argument. After this first Gregg and then Chris will take up the role of core argument presenter. 

For the integration of RR and PP  please see this video with Brett Andersen :
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=87L9yNzNWMk&t=205s

You can support my work on Patreon, with the proceeds going into the research I do at the University of Toronto on the Meaning Crisis and the cultivation of wisdom here: https://www.patreon.com/johnvervaeke 

Join the Discord Server to discuss and reflect upon my work: https://discord.gg/MXxRcmv
